meanings.definition: To repeat aloud from memory or a text.
meanings.sent1: She recites the poem in front of the class.
meanings.sent2: He recites the multiplication table every morning.
meanings.sent3: The parrot recites the same phrase over and over.
meanings.sent4: The old clock recites the hours with its chimes.
meanings.sent5: The teacher recites the rules to the students every day.

meanings.definition: To narrate or describe in detail.
meanings.sent1: The tour guide recites the history of the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: She recites the events of the story with great enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: The robot recites a long and boring monologue.
meanings.sent4: The river recites its journey through the valleys.
meanings.sent5: The actor recites his lines flawlessly on stage.

meanings.sent1: He recites the names of all the planets in order.
meanings.sent2: She recites the ingredients needed for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The child recites a never-ending list of questions.
meanings.sent4: The auctioneer recites the items up for bid quickly.
meanings.sent5: The librarian recites the titles of the books on the shelf.
